name: gift-price-compare
description: Cross-marketplace gift price comparison. On-chain: MarketApp (marketapp.ws), GetGems, Fragment. Off-chain: Portals, Tonnel, MRKT. Giftstat = data aggregator, NOT a marketplace.
author: Kloveren (t.me/morganlegacy)

tools.name: gift_price_compare
tools.description: Compare gift prices across real marketplaces: Portals, Tonnel, Fragment, GetGems, MarketApp. Giftstat is a data aggregator (not a marketplace) that provides floors from off-chain markets.
